_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Technicpack modpacks installation
author: contact@bagou450.com
description:
Install technicpack modpacks.

USED BY MODPACKS INSTALLER DO NOT REMOVE

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
function  unix_args {
    isUnix=$(find ./libraries/net/minecraftforge/forge/*/ -maxdepth 1 -name 'unix_args.txt')
    if [ ${isUnix} ]
    then
      ln -sf libraries/net/minecraftforge/forge/*/unix_args.txt unix_args.txt
    else
    find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*' -exec mv {} ./server.jar \;
    fi
    rm run.bat run.sh start.sh forge*installer.jar fabric*installer.jar
}
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server || exit
rm -rf *
echo -e "Install requirement..."
apt update
apt install -y curl unzip jq
echo -e "Download modpack installer..."
curl -L -o ./file.zip "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
echo -e "Unzip file..."
unzip ./file.zip
echo -e "Remove zip..."
rm ./file.zip
echo -e "Check if subfolder..."
issubfolder=$(ls | wc -l)
if [ "${issubfolder}" -eq 1 ]
then
   mv */* ./
fi
echo -e "Detect type of modpack..."
isForge=$(find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*universal.jar')
isMinecraft=$(find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'minecraft_server.jar')
isForgeFile=$(find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'Forge.jar')
isForgeInstallerFile=$(find ./bin/ -maxdepth 1 -name 'modpack.jar')
isForgeInstallerFileAtRoot=$(find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*installer.jar')
isLibs=$(find ./ -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "libraries")

echo "Modpack detection done."

if [ "${isForge}" ]
then
  echo -e "Forge launch file found"
  echo -e "Rename Files..."
  find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'forge*universal.jar' -exec mv {} server.jar \;
elif [ "${isMinecraft}" ] 
then
  echo -e "Minecraft launch file found"
  echo -e "Rename Files..."
  find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'minecraft_server.jar' -exec mv {} server.jar \;
  echo -e "Remove zip..."
  rm ./file.zip
elif [ "${isForgeFile}" ] 
then
  echo -e "Minecraft launch file found"
  echo -e "Rename Files..."
  find ./ -maxdepth 1 -name 'Forge.jar' -exec mv {} server.jar \;
elif [ "${isForgeInstallerFile}" ]
then
  isMinecraftFile=$(find ./bin/ -maxdepth 1 -name 'minecraft.jar')
  if [ "${isMinecraftFile}" ]
  then
    mv bin/* ./
    rm -rf bin
    downloadversion=${jq -r '.id' version.json | tr --delete Forge}
    data="https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/${downloadversion}/forge-${downloadversion}-installer.jar"
    curl -o ./installer.jar "${data}"
    java -jar installer.jar --installServer
    rm ./installer.jar
    echo -e "Rename Files..."

   unix_args
  else
      echo -e "Forge installer file found in bin folder"
      echo -e "Move Files..."
      mv ./bin/modpack.jar ./
      java -jar modpack.jar --installServer
       unix_args
  fi
elif [ "${isForgeInstallerFileAtRoot}" ]
then
      echo -e "Forge installer file found in at root folder"
      java -jar forge*installer.jar --installServer
      unix_args
else
    if [ ${isLibs} ]
    then
        echo -e "Rename Files..."
        unix_args
    else
        echo -e "Nothing known found install the ${LOADER} manually..."
        if [ "${LOADER}" == "Fabric" ]
        then
            curl -L -o ./fabric-${MCVERSION}-installer.jar "https://privateapi.bagou450.com/api/client/pterodactyl/modpacks/getFabric?version=${MCVERSION}"
            LOADER_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable== true )|.version' | head -n1)
            java -jar fabric*installer.jar server -mcversion $MCVERSION -loader $LOADER_VERSION -downloadMinecraft
            echo "serverJar=vanilla.jar" >> fabric-server-launcher.properties
            mv server.jar vanilla.jar
            mv fabric-server-launch.jar server.jar
            unix_args
        else
            curl -L -o ./forge-${MCVERSION}-installer.jar "https://privateapi.bagou450.com/api/client/pterodactyl/modpacks/getForge?version=${MCVERSION}"
            java -jar forge*installer.jar --installServer
            
            unix_args
        fi
    fi
    
fi
echo -e "Remove zip..."
rm ./file.zip LaunchServer.bat LaunchServer.sh run.bat run.sh start.sh start.bat ServerLinux.sh ServerWindows.sh
echo -e "Installation complete!"

variables.name: Modpack download URL
variables.description: the download url of the modpack

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the Jarfile to use when running Forge version below 1.17.
